column5: Me and my buddy hit up little lake in puslinch today we both got a small pike and he got a perch and a bluegill, saw two largies on the fish tv but that was it missed a few nibbles aswell ice was between 3 and six inches so watch where u go people were riding around on a atv and two dirtbikes around the edges with the coming warm spell be very careful wherever you go he got a couple pics on his phone but i didn't
any idea what the ice is like now?  with thise cold snap I was hoping to try Puslinch or Little this weeekend. any tips appreciated.
I think they'll both be alright by the weekend. Be aware of puslinch though its bigger so wind may be a factor in unsafe ice.
Can't say much about the ice today,but the temps from than till now are like night and day. Would think a lot better.At least after this week anyways.
Guys are fishing Little every day when I drive by it
